Package it.polimi.se2019.model.action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    Common interface to all actions
    CostlyAction
    Common interface to all actions that also perform an ammo payment
    GrabAction
    Interface used exclusively by grab actions
    ShootLeadingAction
    Common interface to all actions that lead to a shoot interaction
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmmoPayment
    Static utility class used to handle and verify ammo payments in actions and shoot interactions
    AmmoPaymentTest  
    GrabAmmoAction
    Action for performing a grab action of an ammo tile in place
    GrabAmmoActionTest  
    GrabWeaponAction
    Action for performing a weapon grab in place
    GrabWeaponActionTest  
    MoveAction
    Action for performing a move
    MoveActionTest  
    MoveGrabAction
    Action for performing consecutively a move and a grab action
    MoveGrabActionTest  
    MoveReloadShootAction
    Action for performing consecutively move, reload and shoot interaction (final frenzy only)
    MoveReloadShootActionTest  
    MoveShootAction
    Action for performing consecutively a move and a shoot interaction
    MoveShootActionTest  
    NewtonAction
    Action for performing newton powerUp behaviour
    ReloadAction
    Action for performing a weapon reload
    ReloadActionTest  
    ShootAction
    Action for performing a shoot action in place
    ShootActionTest  
    TeleportAction
    Action for performing a teleport powerUp behaviour
    TeleportActionTest
